attributes.action: apply political, diplomatic or economic pressure to urge Ethiopia to recognise the border with Eritrea, as designated by the International border commission in 2002.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give Isaias Aferki and Meles Zenawi no reason to return to war. Despite the fact that Ethiopia agreed to accept the International Border Commissions findings they are still allowed by the international community to fail to recognise the border. Failure to recognise this border aids Isaias's iron grip on his people and keeps 1000's in national service.
